DOC.brief_summary: Purpose of this study is to investigate whether intraoperative imaging using a 1.5T MRI in craniopharyngioma surgery is useful in order to increase the rate of complete tumor removal.
DOC.criteria: complex craniopharyngioma > 1cm extension within 2 or more cranial fossae or ventricular system Patient or legal representative able to provide written informed consent tumor size< 1 cm Patients with any condition considered a contraindication to MRI Patients with any condition considered a contraindication for surgery Hypothalamic disturbances Hypothalamic edema
